name: Sports Car Drift: X Speed
description:
Sports Car Drift: X Speed is a most addictive game with high 3d graphics and sounds of cars. The real Super sports car drift racing demands the professional drift racing skills to complete the most challenging off road racing missions. In this sports car driving simulation game, you not only have to drive and park the big muscle cars but also have to perform the acrobatic stunts and amazing drifts before you reach the finish line.
Features

- Open world car driving simulator with city, construction, desert environments.
- Long roads to drift and drive on and do stunt jumps.
- Dynamic traffic with real and intense traffic AI.
- The realistic driving simulator, ultimate driving experience.
- Realistic drifting physics.
